ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: Estimate option missing in issue display settings
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior I can set different options for the display settings within the issue view. The `Estimate` option is missing and I'm not able to hide that column from the table: ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/1368405/ebe541f2-10d3-4403-9824-53aa191da726) ### Steps to reproduce 1. Create project 2. Go to issue page 3. Select `Spreadsheet Layout` 4. Try to hide estimate column ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Self-hosted
